  \paragraph{Frequente Waarden}
  \label{sec:FrequenteWaardenVoorZ}
    \begin{tabular}{|c||ccccc|}

        {\bf $p$}   & 99,7\%     & {\bf 99,0\%}     &  95,4\%       & {\bf 68,3\%}       & {\bf 50,0\%}        \\
